## Bug Description

A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Skill Affected

Which skill has the issue? (e.g., unit-testing, documentation-guide)

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Use skill '...'
3. See error

## Environment

- AI Agent: [e.g., GitHub Copilot, Claude]
- Editor: [e.g., VS Code, Cursor]
- Version: [e.g., 1.0.0]

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here.

If you have suggestions on how to fix the bug, please describe them here.
